attributes.action: Remove contracts from School Meals Firms use local catering providers instead.
attributes.additional_details: Because I don’t wish to live in a morally bankrupt country where our leaders have no principles and corruption appears to be the norm
attributes.background: Send a message that profiteering from child hunger in morally wrong and remove transgressors from any government contracts for 5 years

rejection.details:
Individual schools are responsible for the provision of school meals, including securing contracts for the provision of these.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign: 

Hold an inquiry into contracts providing relief food packages: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/569756
